name: 492 KleinTonno - The last postcard
description:
This artwork has been broadcasted on the German SAT.1 teletext starting from 11 JAN 22. The Tezos NFT contains the original teletext EP1 file and its reproduction as a 400x276 GIF, both created with TIUS™ teletext software and wrapped as an HTML zip. The page's EP1 file has additionally been minted on-chain to preserve teletext forever.

https://app.ardrive.io/#/file/ccb094ab-6a3f-4a8e-8d93-35d143addddf/view
